Pigeon bay camping ground

Classic Kiwi Camping

Back to basics camping. No showers, kitchen or power, just a fantastic location. Site fees start at just $15.  Please book and pay online before arrival to secure your site.

Book Now

Campground Facilities

The Camping Ground is situated on the edge of the Pigeon Bay with a sheltered swimming beach and nearby jetty for water sport activities. Back to basic camping facilities with clean modern toilet block and a picturesque setting.

There is a variety of settings for your camp site whether you are looking for larger areas to share with groups of families and friends or somewhere more secluded and private or for your campervan
Facilities for children include a tennis court, playground and a safe beach which is ideal for swimming.

CAMPING FEES

  • Nightly Site Fee (includes up to 2 people) - $15
  • Per additional adult - $10
  • Per additional child 3-15 years - $5
  • Per additional child under 3 years - No Charge
  • Note a maximum of 6 people per site
  • bookings must be made online
  • Please note no dogs or fires are allowed.
BOOK NOW
